patthana14.7:1.1: Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.7:3.1: Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.7:4.1: Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.7:5.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhataṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)
